content: PROJECT UPTADET, visit new ann here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5451104.new#new IF YOU MISSED PEPE MAYBE SOMETHING NEW IS INCOMING3 DAYS LEFT UNTIL AIRDROP LAUNCHit's time to stop being fu**ed and rekted, It's time for the new most iconic, Fun, irreverend and disrespectfull meme in the world: Pepa, to take the throne as the Queen of memes!!!Pepa is here to Restore the glory of Memecoins.With a stealth launch with a deflationary tokenomics, $PEPA is a coin designed for the FUN people... for FUN entertainment... forever!!!Powered by the pure force of Memetic magic Community, let $PEPA show you the path to MegaSuperIper Success.. maybe...Remember, there's NO official Roadmap, Â No Team, No Whitepaper & Nothing serious.... but it's really fun!!!!This does not mean that we dont know what we are doing... there are a lot of add-on, for example NFT marketplace... and there will be some gift for early community member as like... YOU!PEPA WEBSITE: https://www.pepa.fun/PEPA TWITTER: https://twitter.com/PepatokenPANCAKESWAP: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xE9565D3Ddb04089c08A73173449446e2dd31937bPEPA PRICE CHART: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0xe9565d3ddb04089c08a73173449446e2dd31937bINTERVIEW WITH PEPA'S CEOInterviewer: Hi there, we're here with the CEO of PEPA, a new meme token that's been making waves in the crypto world. Can you tell us a little bit about what PEPA is all about?CEO: Hey, what's up? Yeah, so PEPA is basically a token that's all about having fun and being irreverent. We wanted to create something that would make people laugh and maybe even poke a little fun at the more serious side of the crypto industry.Interviewer: That sounds like a unique approach. Can you tell us a little more about how PEPA works?CEO: Sure thing. So basically, PEPA is a deflationary token, which means that a small percentage of each transaction is burned, reducing the total supply over time. And of course, we've got some pretty fun memes and social media campaigns to go along with it and make it VIRAL!Interviewer: Interesting. What sets PEPA apart from other meme tokens out there?CEO:What sets PEPA apart from other meme tokens is our unique approach to having fun and being irreverent. We're not just about making a quick buck, we're about creating a community of people who enjoy a good laugh and don't take themselves too seriously. Plus, our deflationary tokenomics and social media campaigns are pretty innovative if we do say so ourselves.Interviewer: Sounds like a lot of fun. Any plans for the future of PEPA?CEO: Oh yeah, we've got big plans. We're currently working on some partnerships with some influencers, content creators and other CEX and DEX exchang; and we're hoping to launch some pretty cool NFTs in the future but.. step by step! Stay tuned!Interviewer: Thanks for chatting with us today. Where can our readers go to learn more about PEPA?CEO: Just head on over to our website, pepa.fun, or follow us on Twitter @PEPAToken. And remember, folks, always keep it irreverent!
